title: Best Teeth Whitening Kits in 2025
description: From whitening gel to mouthwash and strips, these teeth whitening products will brighten your smile.
author: Amanda Capritto
excerpt: From whitening gel to mouthwash and strips, these teeth whitening products will brighten your smile.
text: Pros Caters to people with sensitive teeth Easy to incorporate into your routine Alternative to hydrogen peroxide Cons Results may not be as noticeable as other treatments Type Whitening strips, whitening toothpaste and mouthwashRecommended frequency of use For whitening strips: Apply the whitening strips for 30 minutes, then brush with Lumineux whitening toothpaste and rinse with Lumineux whitening mouthwash. Use as often as you’d like. For mouthwash: Rinse vigorously with 1 capful of mouthwash for 60-120 seconds twice a day. For toothpaste: Apply a pea-sized amount of toothpaste and gently brush in circular motions for two minutes.Recommended duration of use Use strips 7 days in a row, then 1-2 times a week thereafter to maintain your white smile.Ingredients Whitening Strips: Vegetable Glycerol, Deionized Water, Carbomer, Carboxymethyl, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Dead Sea Salt (Maris Sal), Salvia Officinalis (Sage) Oil, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Peel Oil. Whitening Formula Mouthwash: Organic Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice, Xylitol*, Purified Water (Aqua), Dead Sea Salt (Maris Sal), Gaultheria Procumbens (Wintergreen) Leaf Oil, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Peel Oil, Salvia Officinalis (Sage) Oil, Mentha Viridis (Spearmint) Leaf Oil, Organic Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Leaf Oil, Ocimum Basilicum (Basil) Oil, Eugenia Caryophyllus (Clove) Flower Oil. Whitening Formula Toothpaste: Organic Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice, Vegetable Glycerin, Xylitol*, Hydrated Silica, Purified Water (Aqua), Dead Sea Salt (Maris Sal), Sodium Methyl Cocoyl Taurate, Xanthan Gum*, Titanium Dioxide, Gaultheria Procumbens (Wintergreen) Leaf Oil, Carrageenan†, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Peel Oil, Salvia Officinalis (Sage) Oil, Mentha Viridis (Spearmint) Leaf Oil, Organic Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Leaf Oil, Ocimum Basilicum (Basil) Oil, Eugenia Caryophyllus (Clove) Flower Oil
html:
Pros

  • Caters to people with sensitive teeth
  • Easy to incorporate into your routine
  • Alternative to hydrogen peroxide

Cons

  • Results may not be as noticeable as other treatments

Type Whitening strips, whitening toothpaste and mouthwash

Recommended frequency of use For whitening strips: Apply the whitening strips for 30 minutes, then brush with Lumineux whitening toothpaste and rinse with Lumineux whitening mouthwash. Use as often as you’d like. For mouthwash: Rinse vigorously with 1 capful of mouthwash for 60-120 seconds twice a day. For toothpaste: Apply a pea-sized amount of toothpaste and gently brush in circular motions for two minutes.

Recommended duration of use Use strips 7 days in a row, then 1-2 times a week thereafter to maintain your white smile.

Ingredients Whitening Strips: Vegetable Glycerol, Deionized Water, Carbomer, Carboxymethyl, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Dead Sea Salt (Maris Sal), Salvia Officinalis (Sage) Oil, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Peel Oil. Whitening Formula Mouthwash: Organic Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice, Xylitol*, Purified Water (Aqua), Dead Sea Salt (Maris Sal), Gaultheria Procumbens (Wintergreen) Leaf Oil, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Peel Oil, Salvia Officinalis (Sage) Oil, Mentha Viridis (Spearmint) Leaf Oil, Organic Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Leaf Oil, Ocimum Basilicum (Basil) Oil, Eugenia Caryophyllus (Clove) Flower Oil. Whitening Formula Toothpaste: Organic Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice, Vegetable Glycerin, Xylitol*, Hydrated Silica, Purified Water (Aqua), Dead Sea Salt (Maris Sal), Sodium Methyl Cocoyl Taurate, Xanthan Gum*, Titanium Dioxide, Gaultheria Procumbens (Wintergreen) Leaf Oil, Carrageenan†, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Peel Oil, Salvia Officinalis (Sage) Oil, Mentha Viridis (Spearmint) Leaf Oil, Organic Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Leaf Oil, Ocimum Basilicum (Basil) Oil, Eugenia Caryophyllus (Clove) Flower Oil
